name: ☁️ Nimbus Icons
description:
Nimbus Icons is a custom open-source icon library designed by Nuvemshop / Tiendanube design team.

It features 122 custom-made icons that exist to accelerate the design and engineering process of every creator that wants to boost stories in Latin America. These icons are local, flexible, and free, so that you can use them anywhere and at any time.


Feel free to request new icons at https://tiendanube.github.io/nimbus-icons/
